magikmama,I'm also not a physician, but a diabetic who has used recreational marijuana in the past.  Klonopin & marijuana sound like a dangerously bad idea to me, however.From what little I've read, I understand that Klonopin is intended to affect your central nervous system (depress it).  That combination with marijuana - which I also remember slowing ME down quite a bit - seems like a potentially hazardous mix.WAK is right on the money with the suggestion to check with a pharmacist or your doctor.  If you're anywhere near a university, it's likely that physicians & pharmicists are accustomed to working with folks who like to use marijuana.  If you're in a location where medical marijuana is allowed, there're likely well-informed medical folks there, too.Good luck, magikmama.  It sure sounds as tho' you're dealing with a lot.
